ygData.subject: Re: de training in grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: This is incorrect.  If they won t talk to you or will KoS you, they you cannot do the quest as they will reject the items in my experience.  Therefore you
ygData.messageBody:
This is incorrect. If they won't talk to you or will KoS you, they you cannot do the quest as they will reject the items in my experience. Therefore you cannot get the faction increase. I have never found a way to increase faction with the guards in any of the evil race cities, only lower it.

Scragg
Bristlebane

>hmm.. there IS a way to raise faction enough with the guild that you can
>train there, since you can get there in the first place. human SK cant even
>get past the first guards in grobb ;(

>bring 4 bone chips at a time to the main sk guy in grobb, and he will give
>you a rusty 2h sword and some faction. while this may be a slow way for you
>to build money at your level, it DOES give the always-needed faction boosts,
>and eventually you should gain enough that they allow you to train there and
>gain quests.

>Beld Demonblade
>Fennin Ro
